mapper.insert: insert into user_info (id,nick_name, real_name, head_img, id_number, phone, email, sex, birthday, province, city, district, regist_time) values (#{id},#{nickName}, #{realName}, #{headImg}, #{idNumber}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{registTime})
mapper.update: update user_info set nick_name = #{nickName}, real_name = #{realName}, head_img = #{headImg}, id_number = #{idNumber}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, regist_time = #{registTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, nick_name, real_name, head_img, id_number, phone, email, sex, birthday, province, city, district, regist_time from user_info where id = #{id}
select id, nick_name, real_name, head_img, id_number, phone, email, sex, birthday, province, city, district, regist_time from user_info
